name: Yuan for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Yuan is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Vientiane, Laos, Yuan is a very artistic person. For many years in school she visited a drama class.

One time her drama class’s teacher had gone home sick, so all students were just put in a classroom with a movie to entertain them for the period when an alarm went off. None of them were sure, if it was the fire alarm or the lock-down alarm, so they all head out into the hall to check and no one’s out there, so they head back in and climb under their desks as is lock-down procedure. Cut to an hour or so later when a teacher bursts in and nearly dies of relief, because the school was on fire and Yuan and her classmates were the only students not accounted for and half the faculty and fire department had been searching for them for ages. Literally, the whole school had filled with smoke while they’d kept super safe under their wooden desks. Yuan remember this story with a laugh, they didn't feel scared, it was very funny to hide under the desks.

Yuan is sure that a real life is too boring, she needs action and change every day, this is why Yuan decided to become a prostitute. She loves to play different roles in a bedroom.

Help Yuan to take her place on the street!

short_description: Yuan is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
